entries.title: Algorithms Allegedly Penalized Black Renters. The US Government Is Watching
entries.description: The Department of Justice warned a provider of tenant-screening software that its technology must comply with fair housing law.

entries.title: Twitter Is a Megaphone for ‘Sudden Death’ Vaccine Conspiracies
entries.description: By reinstating banned accounts and selling blue checks, Musk has supercharged “the most dangerous” Covid disinformation.
